content: row 25 mark sts 9 and 10 with one marker if you can 26 decrease 1 single_crochet 1 x6 12 ● finish stuffing 27 decrease 6 fo 6 ● leave tail a couple inches long use the tail to sew the opening shut by weaving through the flo of each st through the front then pulling tight like a drawstring bag hide the tail inside beak orange x1 crochet directly into body in the sts marked on row 22 with the top of the head facing toward you and the tail down start crocheting in st 11 of body 1 start with a slip knot on hook in st 11 single_crochet 1 chain 1 2 in st 10 double_crochet 1 chain 1 3 in st 9 single_crochet 1 fo ● hide ends inside using either a crochet hook or yarn needle do not remove st markers comb red x1 crochet directly into the body through both the sts marked on row 25 to be properly centered start with the chicken facing right comb is made of one row but each number is a different point in the head like you re crocheting through sts 1 start with slip knot on hook slip_stitch 1 chain 2 starting on 2nd chain st single_crochet 1 2 find a centered point along the next row up on the head to work into next slip_stitch 1 chain 3 starting on 2nd chain st single_crochet 2 3 find another point next row up should be the front of the circle sewn together to close work off slip_stitch 1 chain 3 starting on 2nd chain st single_crochet 2 ©2024aybeecreates chickenandchickcrochetpattern 4 next point should be the back of the circle on the head slip_stitch 1 chain 2 starting on 2nd chain st single_crochet 1 5 next row down find a center point slip_stitch fo ● hide ends inside remove st markers wattles red x2 crochet directly into the body through the outside sts of the beak sts 9 and 11 marked on row 22 each st marked will be a different waddle start with the chicken facing towards you 1 start with slip knot on hook in st 9 or 11 slip_stitch 1 chain 2 slip_stitch 1 back into original st fo ● hide ends inside remove st marker right wing main color x1 crochet directly into the body through the 32nd st marked on row 17 start with the chicken facing right 1 start with slip knot on hook *slip_stitch 1 single_crochet 1 double_crochet 4 single_crochet 1* chain 1 turn 6 2 *single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 * double_crochet increase 1 double_crochet 2 double_crochet increase 1 *half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet 1 * chain 1 turn 10 3 slip_stitch 3 chain 5 starting on 3rd chain st half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet 2 skip 1 st of main wing piece slip_stitch 1 x2 chain 5 starting on 3rd chain st half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet 2 skip 2 st of main wing piece slip_stitch 1 fo ● thread end down the side of
